MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY14 postcode area of Malpas, affecting properties in Childlow and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at midnight due to a snapped overhead line pole. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:40PM on 26th April 2021.
